By silencing conservative, pro-America voices, Twitter has abandoned any claim to Sec. 230 protections. This means Twitter can now be sued for all the content that appears on its platform, since Twitter as actually a publisher that engages in aggressive, politically-oriented censorship of whatever content it doesn’t like.

Google has systematically suppressed all websites that dare talk about vaccine ingredients, vaccine side effects, vaccine propaganda, CDC quack science or corruption and fraud throughout the vaccine industry.
All these tech giants hide their fascist de-platforming activities under the dishonest banner of “removing hate speech,” but their definition of “hate speech” is deceptive from the start. As PJ Media explains:
Facebook and other social media platforms have rules against “hate speech,” which increasingly has come to mean speech that liberals in Silicon Valley disagree with. If you criticize a woman who brags about her abortion on social media, you’re engaging in hate speech. If you insist that there are only two genders or that marriage should be limited to one man and one woman, you’re guilty of hate speech, according to our moral betters who run the social media platforms.
“Hate speech,” in other words, is anything lunatic Leftists don’t want to hear. Leftists are now even equating their censorship with “freedom,” claiming that anyone who contradicts their twisted worldview is engaged in taking away their freedom, and thus censoring, banning and de-platforming all political opponents is how they “protect freedom.” We are currently working with attorneys and lawmakers to help challenge the speech monopolies of the tech giants...”...
Censored.news is our alternative to Google News. It aggregates, in real time, news headlines from across the internet’s most heavily censored websites.
Brighteon.com is the alternative to YouTube. This free speech video site hosts 100,000+ videos from thousands of channels, many of which have been banned by YouTube. Brighteon was recently under severe attack by upstream infrastructure providers, but it survived the attack and is being engineered for a “Brighteon 2.0” release later this year, which will insulate the service from censorship threats in the future.
NewsTarget.com is our politics and culture news website. There, you’ll find original stories each day that aren’t always on Natural News.
The Natural News email newsletter brings you a daily email summary of that day’s most important news headlines. Subscribing is free, and our email subscriber list is kept strictly confidential to us.
Counterthink.com is a video commentary and analysis website featuring episodes of the Counterthink broadcast. Here, you’ll find my analysis of current events, civil war, survival strategies and the globalist agenda for human depopulation.
If you wish to avoid politics and focus on health, nutrition, medicine, science, technology, space exploration and other similar topics, we have websites dedicated to those topics and much more. Consider these:
Science.news – All about scientific discoveries, nearly all articles cite science journals.
Medicine.news – Covers more mainstream medicine, including medical technology and medical studies about prevention and longevity.
Space.news – All about outer space, including astronomy and space travel. Many stories cover Mars.
Health.news – Mainstream health news for consumers. Less technical than medicine.news , carries stories with recipes, health tips and more.
Physics.news – Covers discoveries and breakthroughs about quantum computing, light, nanotechnology, materials science and more.
Research.news – All about research into nutrition, science, medicine, environment and more.
Robots.news – Breaking news about robotics, AI systems and automation systems that are increasingly replacing human workers.
In addition to those sites, you may also explore Survival.news , Food.news , Environ.news and hundreds more. Share the stories you appreciate and keep checking your favorite sites for more daily news updates.
The Natural News editorial team keeps expanding. Despite the efforts of the evil techno-fascists to de-platform us and sabotage our operations, our team is consistently expanding, even as we pump more R&D money into the Brighteon platform for its 2.0 release. ..”

title: Breitbart Texas Editor Brandon Darby Locked Out of Twitter over Border Murder Story | Breitbart
content:
Social media sites like Facebook and Twitter need to decide whether they are "platforms" or "publishers." If they are platforms, they cannot censor any legal content or favor one side over another on any controversial issue. As such, they are not responsible for the content on their sites.
If they choose to be publishers, though, they can censor content, but they can also be held civilly and criminally liable for anything that appears on their sites including libel, fraud, terrorist threats, incitement to violence, and child pornography. Regardless of what they claim, if they censor any legal content, they cement their status as publishers and assume liability for all content on their sites.
We don't need any new laws to implement this, just a couple of court cases.

title: Tijuana Drug War Rages: 21 Murders in less than 48 Hours
content:
No gun control? You ever drive down the i5 to TJ before? There are big signs saying firearms are prohibited in Mexico.
I like guns more than you do, but they don't prevent crime nor do they create it. The right to bear arms was to let the government know what happens when they overstep their bounds. But since they do it on a regular basis and nobody does anything about it, it might as well not even exist.
